Proto-persona

Problem Statement

Allison needs a way to review and be tested on previously learned vocabulary because this keeps her engaged and ensures she recalls the material outside her short-term memory.

We will know this to be true when we see Allisonâ€™s repeated use of the app and when she achieves her daily goal for vocabulary words.

User Flow

Wireframes

Splash and Login Pages

Login pages include password recovery options

Account creation and Onboarding

Onboarding collects study goal information

Completion of Onboarding and Lesson

Coach marks to familiarize and lesson example

Lesson Completion and Flashcards

Shows progress towards study goal. Has the ability to create custom flashcard decks.
